name: bubble pop (itch) (S. PARK)
description:
Final group project for a university computer systems software course.

Made using Assembly (MASM32).

CONTROLS 

W to move up

S to move down

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot (hold to shoot continuously)

P to pause

GAMEPLAY

There are 10 waves (levels) with 10 bubbles in each wave. Your objective is to shoot and pop all bubbles before the timer runs out.

The timer resets for each wave, i.e. you have 20 seconds to complete each wave.

Your score increases with every bubble you pop. The quicker you pop a bubble, the more points you score.

The game ends when either:

- You complete wave 10

- The timer runs out

Try to get the highest score you can by being accurate and popping bubbles as quickly as possible. Good luck!
